CustomField.description: Each license period for this contract gets its own number. For example, for an annual contract, the first year is License Period Number 1, and the second year is License Period Number 2, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Each license period for this contract gets its own number. For example, for an annual contract, the first year is License Period Number 1, and the second year is License Period Number 2, etc.
CustomField.label: License Period Number
